short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Specifies what age the Wikipedia subject was during given year.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you have a habit of comparing yourself to others, this is the plug-in for you. Who cares at what year someone started a company/published a book/won the Nobel? You want to know how old they were. This plug-in appends all years with how old a given subject was at that time and saves you from having to do mental math.
